name: The Great Gaias
blurb: The Great Gaias is a story-driven role playing game designed for lifelong lovers of the classical styled JRPG genre.

rewards.reward: No Reward

NEOPHYTE

============================= 

THANK YOU!

Receive the E-mail Newsletter giving updates on the progress of The Great Gaias in acknowledgment of your support, we sincerely appreciate you taking the time to donate and look at our page.

 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
REGULATIONS:

Stackable items are not permitted in any reward tier unless otherwise noted. (I. E. All previous rewards do not include copies of the game or hard copies of artwork or the game in excess of the original reward tier.)

If you are having trouble with clarification on any reward tier please view the bottom of our Kickstarter page for a graphic description of our rewards for all tiers.

 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Thank you for your support!

NOVICE

============================= 
A digital-wallpaper depicting the playable character of your choice in high-resolution as well as the NEWSLETTER detailing updates to the Great Gaias sent directly to your E-mail!
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL-----------\r\nDigital download of The Great Gaias for only $10! This tier is only for the game, but for this price who can go wrong with a 50+ hour RPG!

APPRENTICE 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DIGITAL TIER

============================= 

Receive a digital download of "The Great Gaias" as well as a digital WALLPAPER of the character of your choosing, You will also receive the NEWSLETTER updates.

AMATEUR
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DIGITAL TIER

============================= 

Not only will you receive a digital download of "The Great Gaias", but you will also have exclusive access to our working demo!
This demo depicts selected stories within The Great Gaias, as well as the beginning of the game where you will see how Pots' leaves the Thieves' Guild and how the team began their journey against insurmountable odds!
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You will also receive a digital WALLPAPER of the character of your choosing, You will also receive the NEWSLETTER updates.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL #2\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nFor a limited amount of backers we are offering The Great Gaias' original soundtrack paired with the game for $20 less than our original reward! A 50+ hr RPG paired with its original high-quality soundtrack for $25!

JOURNEYMAN
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DIGITAL TIER

============================= 

Receive (2) Digital downloads of "The Great Gaias" and be listed as contributor on the credits of the completed game along with the DEMO + WALLPAPER and NEWSLETTER..

ADEPT
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DIGITAL TIER

============================= 

Receive (2) Digital downloads of "The Great Gaias" and access to the private development forum where you can communicate directly with Horizon's End during the development process. This tier also gets you listed as CONTRIBUTOR, the DEMO, and  (2) Wallpapers of your choosing, and the NEWSLETTER.

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL #3 - ALL DIGITAL TIER\r\nWhat could be better than a 50+ hr RPG and an original soundtrack? How about the high resolution digital copies of Lucy Lee's beautiful artbook and Jared Blando's Map? Yes, that's right. For a Limited time you can receive The Great Gaias (digital), DEMO, ARTBOOK, WORLD MAP, and the SOUNDTRACK! (includes previous digital rewards and contributor status)

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL #4 - BETA ACCESS\r\nTo counter the high demand of beta access we are offering a limited amount of BETA PASSES that will include BETA ACCESS - DIGITAL GAME - DIGITAL OST - DIGITAL ARTBOOK - and DIGITAL WORLD MAP, all of these digital art creations will be sent in high resolution so you can print them as much as you want to make posters, stickers, you name it! This tier will also come with the poster that we were offering at the TooManyGames convention!

EXPERT
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DIGITAL TIER

============================= 

A digital duo package - (1) digital download of "The Great Gaias" and the original SOUNDTRACK composed by Aaron Krogh in high-quality audio along with development FORUM access, DEMO, CONTRIBUTOR status, (2) WALLPAPERS, and the updates from the NEWSLETTER.

MASTER
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
PHYSICAL GOODS TIER

============================= 
Limited Edition Hard copy of "The Great Gaias" and the Original Sound Track with cover art designed by Lucy Lee, (1) digital download of "The Great Gaias", FORUM access, DEMO, CONTRIBUTOR status, (3) WALLPAPERS, and NEWSLETTER.

GRANDMASTER
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
ALL DIGITAL TIER 

============================= 
All digital tier that gives you (1) digital download of "The Great Gaias", (1) digital download of the Original Soundtrack, and a digital copy of both the Jared Blando's WORLD MAP and the ARTBOOK with access to the development FORUM, DEMO, CONTRIBUTOR status, (5) WALLPAPERS, and the NEWSLETTER.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
ADDED! This tier will also come with BETA ACCESS!

KNIGHT
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
ALL DIGITAL - BETA TESTING TIER

============================= 
You will receive digital copies of the GAME, SOUNDTRACK, WORLD MAP, ARTBOOK, and receive BETA-ACCESS that gives you the opportunity to see The Great Gaias before its release and help find any remaining bugs to be squashed! You will also  be listed as QA TESTER if you find a legitimate bug or glitch (which means you will be in personal contact with Horizon's End throughout the Beta period in an exclusive Beta-Tester Forum), and also listed as CONTRIBUTOR on the credits of the finished project. playable DEMO, DEVELOPMENT FORUM ACCESS - ALL WALLPAPERS - NEWSLETTER

NOBLE
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
PHYSICAL GOODS + DIGITAL - BETA TESTING TIER

=============================
Limited BETA-ACCESS pass to test out the game before its release, (1) digital copy of the ARTBOOK, (1) digital copy of the WORLD MAP, and LIMITED EDITION HARD COPY of the completed GAME and SOUNDTRACK  + DEMO + DEVELOPMENT/BETA FORUM ACCESS + ALL WALLPAPERS & NEWSLETTER

LORD
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
PHYSICAL GOODS + DIGITAL TIER - ART BOOK

=============================
Hard copy of the ARTBOOK depicting beautiful works from our team including but not limited to monster design, landscape and portrait art, and conceptual drawings and all benefits of the $100 reward. You will receive digital copies of the GAME, SOUNDTRACK, WORLD MAP, ARTBOOK, as well as BETA ACCESS + DEMO + CONTRIBUTOR STATUS + DEVELOPMENT/BETA FORUM ACCESS + ALL WALLPAPERS + NEWSLETTER

BARON
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
PHYSICAL GOODS TIER - LIMITED COLLECTORS EDITION
=============================
Hard copies of both "The Great Gaias" and the Original Soundtrack, an 11" x 17" hard copy of Jared Blando's World Map of Tenat and a hard copy of the ARTBOOK, as well as the ALL-DIGITAL PACKAGE which includes digital copies of the GAME, SOUNDTRACK, WORLD MAP and ARTBOOK, +  BETA ACCESS + CONTRIBUTOR STATUS + DEMO + DEVELOPMENT/BETA FORUM ACCESS + ALL WALLPAPERS + NEWSLETTER

COUNT
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
CREATOR TIER - ALL DIGITAL*
=============================
This creator tier allows the contributor to design a NPC including profession, dialogue mannerisms and design of the sprite to be used in game (Horizon's End must approve), plus the ALL-DIGITAL PACKAGE + BETA ACCESS + CONTRIBUTOR STATUS + DEMO + DEVELOPMENT/BETA FORUM ACCESS + ALL WALLPAPERS + NEWSLETTER 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
* If you would like hard copies please contact Horizon's End and we will work with you.

MARQUESS
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
CREATOR TIER - ALL DIGITAL*
=============================
Create a piece of Legendary equipment, a one-of-a-kind armor, weapon or accessory including its backstory, and a custom NPC of your choosing as stated in the COUNT-LEVEL REWARD TIER.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This package also includes:

ALL-DIGITAL PACKAGE + BETA ACCESS + CONTRIBUTOR STATUS + DEMO + DEVELOPMENT/BETA FORUM ACCESS + ALL WALLPAPERS + NEWSLETTER 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

* If you would like hard copies please contact Horizon's End and we will work with you.

VICEROY
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
CREATOR TIER - ALL DIGITAL*
=============================
Design a side-quest of your choosing, that can include all aspects of the Equipment and NPC rewards detailed in the $300 and $200 reward tiers.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This package also includes:

ALL-DIGITAL PACKAGE + BETA ACCESS + CONTRIBUTOR STATUS + DEMO + DEVELOPMENT/BETA FORUM ACCESS + ALL WALLPAPERS + NEWSLETTER 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

* If you would like hard copies please contact Horizon's End and we will work with you.

DUKE
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
ALPHA TIER - EARLY CONTRIBUTOR SPECIAL - LIMITED - ALL DIGITAL*
=============================
If you are generous enough to pick this SUPREMELY LIMITED tier, you will be given access to all of our pre-alpha, alpha, and beta demos that we will release throughout the production of “The Great Gaias” via your own Horizon's End Dropbox, you will work along the development team to help resolve issues (Skype or Email), game play glitches, and be up to speed on everything that happens with the development of the game and be listed as QA TESTER on the credits.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
This reward tier comes complete with the Limited Collector's Package that includes hard copies of The Great Gaias, the Original Soundtrack, the Artbook, and the World Map of Tenat. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This package also includes:

ALL-DIGITAL PACKAGE + BETA ACCESS + CONTRIBUTOR STATUS + DEMO + DEVELOPMENT/BETA FORUM ACCESS + ALL WALLPAPERS + NEWSLETTER 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

ARCHDUKE
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
SPECIAL-PASS - PHYSICAL & DIGITAL TIER
=============================
Horizon’s End SPECIAL LIFETIME PASS, Not only will you receive all previous rewards (excluding the creator tiers) but you will be granted a life-time guarantee pass that you will be able to receive a digital download of any game that Horizon’s End ever produces.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This reward tier comes complete with the Limited  Collector's Package that includes hard copies of The Great Gaias, the Original Soundtrack, the Artbook, and the World Map of Tenat.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This package also includes:

BETA-ACCESS + ALL-DIGITAL PACKAGE + CONTRIBUTOR STATUS + DEMO + QA & DEVELOPMENT FORUM ACCESS + ALL WALLPAPERS + NEWSLETTER 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

PRINCE
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EXECUTIVE PRODUCER - PHYSICAL & DIGITAL TIER
=============================
You will be listed as Executive Producer on the credits of the game and receive a personal phone call and autographed high-resolution map from the founders of Horizon’s End to convey our utmost gratitude for helping our dream comes true.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This reward tier comes complete with the Limited Collector's Package that includes hard copies of The Great Gaias, the Original Soundtrack, the Artbook, and the World Map of Tenat.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This package also includes:

SPECIAL LIFETIME PASS + BETA-ACCESS + ALL-DIGITAL PACKAGE + EXECUTIVE PRODUCER STATUS + DEMO + QA & DEVELOPMENT FORUM ACCESS + ALL WALLPAPERS + NEWSLETTER 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

KING
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EXECUTIVE PRODUCER - CHARACTER CREATION - PHYSICAL & DIGITAL TIER
=============================
You will be able to design your own player-character to be used in the game. (Horizon's End must approve) Yes, that’s right. Your very own character in a JRPG including his or her own unique class, skills, history, and legendary equipment set. This, of course, also grants you all other tier rewards including:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The Limited Collector's Package that includes hard copies of The Great Gaias, the Original Soundtrack, the Artbook, and the World Map of Tenat.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This package also includes:

SPECIAL LIFETIME PASS + BETA-ACCESS + ALL-DIGITAL PACKAGE + EXECUTIVE PRODUCER STATUS + DEMO + QA & DEVELOPMENT FORUM ACCESS + ALL WALLPAPERS + NEWSLETTER 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This tier includes the benefits of the $500 reward regarding Pre-Alpha Testing.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

EMPEROR
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
PRODUCER - CHARACTER CREATION - PHYSICAL & DIGITAL TIER
=============================
You are now considered to be a God among men. You will receive all previous rewards and will be flown out to New York to party in the Big Apple with the developers of Horizon's End at a banquet in honor of your most generous donation. This weekend retreat will be paid in full by Horizon's End and you will be able to give us your input on the development of "The Great Gaias".  (Only applicable within the USA)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This reward tier is complete with The Limited Collector's Package signed by Horizon's End that includes hard copies of The Great Gaias, the Original Soundtrack, the Artbook, and the World Map of Tenat.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This package also includes:

SPECIAL LIFETIME PASS + ALPHA & BETA-ACCESS + ALL-DIGITAL PACKAGE + DEMO + PRODUCER STATUS + QA & DEVELOPMENT FORUM ACCESS + ALL WALLPAPERS + NEWSLETTER 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This tier includes the benefits of the $500 reward regarding Pre-Alpha Testing.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
